amendment.description: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following: SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE. This Act may be cited as the "Air and Health Quality Empowerment Zone Designation Act of 2017". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-229 to strike the underlying bill and replace it with a grant program to benefit regions with the poorest air quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McNerney.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McNerney.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
